conversations.body_text: Hi Parth Patel,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our holiday break. Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We will ship it to you within the next couple of days.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468564
